programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Cora'' - Cora, an eight-year-old Doberman mix, gets a new shot at life when potential owner, Nikki, decides to adopt a senior dog. But will Cora be able to shed a lifetime of bad habits to make way for a new talent?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Shadow'' - Living alone for the first time in fifty years, retiree Gary seeks out a new companion in Shadow, a one-year old Chihuahua mix. But before they can make new memories together, Shadow must learn to put aside the trust issues of his past.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Pluto'' - We're blasting off! Brandon rescues Pluto, a Tibetan terrier mix with gravity defying energy. But will Pluto's marking habit ground the adoption process before it can launch?

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Overcoming Obstacles'' - Age. Experience. Physical limitation. Every dog faces its own unique hurdles in training. But with Brandon's guidance, they're all capable of achieving new heights.

programme.title: Lucky Dog
programme.desc: ''Sandy'' - A golden retriever answers the call of duty for a wounded warrior who's in need. But to earn his service dog badge, Sandy must successfully complete Brandon's boot camp.

programme.title: Lucky Dog

programme.title: Lucky Dog

programme.title: Lucky Dog

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Destination" - A retired businessman travels from England to Florida to visit his family but dies soon after arriving. Dr. G must now determine what mysteriously killed this healthy man so suddenly.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Toxic Forces" - Amanda Reese breaks out in hives and begins to hyperventilate after returning from a Hurricane Katrina relief effort. Dr. G wonders if an infection caused this young woman's untimely death.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Derailed" - A train passenger behaves oddly en route to Arizona and then disappears. The next day his bloodied body is found in Texas. Dr. G attempts to piece together this bizarre tragedy.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Broken Lives" - Dr. G must figure out if a decomposed body is that of a local missing woman and if she was murdered.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Life Interrupted" - During her career as a medical examiner, Dr. G has autopsied thousands of murder victims. In this episode, Dr. G shares her most memorable case.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Journey" - Dr. G reviews a woman's medical records and learns that that she suffered from an auto-immune disease called lupus, which might have something to do with her death.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Speeds" - Motor vehicle fatalities account for many of the cases that come into the morgue. Dr. G offers expertise as to how to get behind the wheel and not wind up on a steel table.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Deadly Doses" - When Dr. G receives Lea Conrad's body, she suspects the woman may have died from an antihistamine overdose. Then, Dr. G learns that Lea was being treated for lupus.

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Twist of Fate" - An elderly woman is driving when she's overcome with shooting pains and crashes her car. She's rushed to the hospital, but the doctors find nothing wrong. Can Dr. G find the cause of death?

programme.title: Dr. G Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Shock to The System" - Police discover the dead body of Andrew Hopper clutching a syringe and covered with blood. The body is in Dr. G's hands, as are the clues to solving the case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1981, New York correctional officer Donna Payant disappeared and was later found in a landfill. The medical examiner not only identified the cause of death, but also found an important clue.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1999, nine-year-old Valiree Jackson vanished on her way to school near Spokane, WA. Her father Brad Jackson reported the disappearance and the entire community started searching for her abductor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, off-duty Maine State Trooper Vicky Gardner is attacked by Steven Fortin during a routine stop.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When 19-year-old Lori Auker left her Pennsylvania home for work and never arrived, it took space-age technology, cat hairs and insects to pinpoint the image of the woman's abductor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fan of murder mysteries and forensic science shows uses what she learned from TV to determine who was responsible for the accident which permanently injured her 4-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Lisa Manderach and her daughter Devon left their Pennsylvania home to go shopping, but didn't return home.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: In 1996, police received a call from Darlie Routier telling them of her two sons' murders. The police found the killer by analyzing blood spatter, doing behavioral profiling and analyzing Darlie's 911 call.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: In 1990, Shirley Andronowich's body was found mutilated. Eyewitnesses told police she had a fight with her husband the night before, but forensic evidence proved that he had nothing to do with her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Sometime during a neighborhood Christmas party, five-year-old Melissa Brannen disappeared. Investigators turned to forensic science to help them see what the witnesses missed.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: The doctors at the hospital couldn't determine the cause of Bobby Curley's hallucinations and intense pain. They treated it as a neurological disorder but his condition deteriorated. He was being poisoned.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Who was the sexual offender who murdered two adolescent boys in Nebraska? The key to stopping him would be the unique composition of the "junk rope" he used to tie his victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Janice Johnson was found dead at the foot of her basement stairs. Police in Nova Scotia had to unravel the circumstances surrounding Janice's death and answer the question: Was it an accident or murder?

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: In 1996, more than a dozen children in Seattle, Washington, were fighting for their lives. Each one of them had contracted a serious unknown illness. After one died, investigators knew the clock was ticking.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Fire engulfs the home where Lori Keidel and her siblings were left alone while their father went to the laundromat. Years after her mother's disappearance, Lori tells police she witnessed her mother's death.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Edward Post drew a bath for his wife before going for a run. He returned to find her not breathing. She died before emergency response arrived. Police considered her death accidental until a motive surfaced.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: Women in a Louisiana city live in fear of a rapist who leaves no clues to his identity. But technology and behavioral science combine to give police a new forensic tool. Police narrow their search to one man: local policeman Randy Comeaux.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: When the wife of a well-known dentist is found dead, police struggle to identify a suspect. Some fibers and a study of the weather patterns on the night of the murder break the case open and reveal the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: When Joann Katrinak is found dead in a corn field with her infant son, the obvious suspect is the husband and father of the victims. But insects found on the bodies reveal a vital clue which uncovers a twisted story of passion gone wrong.

programme.title: Total Wipeout
programme.desc: Total Wipeout is back with this exciting last season! They have created two new games, the 'Double Cross' and the 'Terror-Go-Round'. programme.title: Total Wipeout

programme.title: Total Wipeout

programme.title: Total Wipeout

programme.title: The Food Ranger
programme.desc: Trevor tours La Merced Market in Mexico City and finds cactus, blood sausage and spicy BBQ tacos.

programme.title: The Food Ranger

programme.title: The Food Ranger
programme.desc: Trevor begins his day in Oaxaca with a Mexican breakfast of eggs grilled on a comal with a side of fresh tortillas and salsa. Later, he travels outside the city to Zachilla to try their famous spicy lamb barbacoa tacos.

programme.title: The Food Ranger

programme.desc: Spencer shares his favorite recipes for quick and budget-friendly pizza.

programme.desc: Juan Pablo cooks traditional Venezuelan recipes.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chef Leah Wildman combines duck and dates.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Chef Lauren Gulyas combines cashews and carrots.

programme.title: Beef Stir-Fry and Scallion Pancakes
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster goes into the test kitchen with host Julia Collin Davison to learn how to make Beef Stir-Fry with Bell Peppers and Black Pepper Sauce. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of soy sauce. Next, test cook Keith Dresser shows Julia how to make Scallion Pancakes with Dipping Sauce.

programme.title: Modern Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: Modern Weeknight Meals Test cook Becky Hays makes Bridget the perfect One-Hour Broiled Chicken and Pan Sauce. In the Equipment Corner, expert Adam Ried reviews blenders, and then test cook Tim Chin wraps up the episode by making Julia the ultimate Modern Cauliflower Gratin.

programme.title: Sous Vide for Everybody
programme.desc: Test cook Dan Souza makes Bridget Sous Vide Seared Steaks. Equipment expert Adam Ried then reviews his top pick for sous vide machines, and test cook Elle Simone makes a show stopping sous vide staple: Soft-Poached Eggs.

programme.title: Roast Chicken and Sprouts
programme.desc: In this episode, Julia and Bridget unlock the secrets to the ultimate Roast Chicken with Warm Bread Salad. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of white miso. Finally, test cook Elle Simone teaches Bridget how to make foolproof Skillet-Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Chile, Peanuts, and Mint.

programme.title: Fried Rice and Kung Pao Shrimp
programme.desc: We show you how to prepare fried rice and kung pao shrimp. Our findings about rice cookers and long-grain white rice guarantee perfect rice every time.

programme.title: Showstopper Desserts
programme.desc: When entertaining, we like desserts that look more complicated to prepare than they really are. A chocolate mousse cake requires a minimum of ingredients and comes together in minutes, but it is sure to elicit the proper oohs and aahs from guests. And a chilled lemon soufflé is made from basic ingredients that you probably have in your kitchen right now.

programme.title: Summer Tomatoes
programme.desc: What's the best way to enjoy summer tomatoes? It's hard to argue with a recipe that goes something like this: Slice, salt, and serve. Still, there are times when you want to use tomatoes in more elaborate dishes, and gazpacho and a cheesy tart are two of our favorites.

programme.title: Restaurant Cooking at Home
programme.desc: We take our restaurant favorites, Crab Towers and Flambéed Lobster, and show you how to make them at home.

programme.title: Let's Talk Turkey
programme.desc: Thanksgiving can strike fear into the heart of even the most proficient cook. First, there's the turkey to contend with-in no other meal is the main course paraded in front of guests with as much fanfare. Sweet potato casserole is often considered another must-have. With our recipes for these Thanksgiving standards, we minimize the work so that the cook can enjoy the holiday as much as everyone else.

programme.title: Grilled Pizza
programme.desc: We set out to develop a hassle-free pizza recipe especially for the grill-one we hope will become a new backyard barbecue favorite.

programme.title: More Tex-Mex Favorites
programme.desc: We create tasty versions of two Tex-Mex favorites: chicken fajitas and huevos rancheros.

programme.title: Lighter Family Favorites
programme.desc: Whether we admit it or not, there are some dishes that, while tasty, are just too high in fat and calories to be enjoyed on a regular basis. Even a modest portion of macaroni and cheese or chicken Parmesan is prohibitive. But that doesn't need to be the case.

programme.title: Chocolate Delights
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia uncover the secrets to making Foolproof All-Butter Pie Dough and Chocolate Cream Pie, and tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of cocoa powder. Finally, test cook Elle Simone makes Julia a decadent Dark Chocolate Fudge Sauce.

programme.title: The Perfect Cookie
programme.desc: Test cook Dan Souza makes Julia a festive recipe for Easy Holiday Sugar Cookies. Equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for parchment paper, and gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews silicone baking mats. Test cook Lan Lam then makes Bridget the Best Lemon Bars.

programme.title: Elegant Dinner Party
programme.desc: In this episode, Bridget and Julia uncover the secrets to the ultimate Braised Brisket with Pomegranate, Cumin, and Cilantro. In the Equipment Corner, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews his top pick for twist corkscrews. Finally, test cook Dan Souza makes a decadent Duchess Potato Casserole.

programme.title: Holiday Feast
programme.desc: Test cook Ashley Moore shows host Bridget Lancaster how to make a Crumb-Crusted Rack of Lamb that is perfect for the holidays. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top picks of electric knives. Finally, test cook Christie Morrison shows Julia how to make a showstopping Brussels Sprout Gratin.

programme.title: Soup for Dinner
programme.desc: Test cook Dan Souza and host Julia Collin Davison make Chicken Bouillabaisse, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of cinnamon, and then Julia and Bridget uncover the secrets to Avgolemono.

programme.title: Dine & Dish Nation - Empire Kitchen Pop’s for Italian Detroit Axe
programme.desc: Host Kam Carman welcomes Musonda Mwila, Michael Sanders and Michelle Dritsan, who review bistro fare and craft cocktails at the Empire Kitchen true Italian fare with homemade pasta, of course, at Pop's for Italian and a casual menu of eats at the high-energy Detroit Axe restaurant.

programme.title: Graham Kerrs Kitchen - Pork Stir Fry
programme.desc: Rich and fragrant, a glossy red wine and herb marinade highlights the tender port and crisp vegetables.

programme.title: Hawaii Cooks with Roy Yamaguchi - Kona, Hawaii
programme.desc: Located on the west end of the Big Island, Kona, is characterized by rich volcanic soil, light afternoon rains and year round mild tropical temperatures - ideal conditions for growing coffee. For over a century, the Kona area produced the only coffee grown in the United States. Coffee production was the heart of the Kona community.

programme.title: Justin Wilson's Easy Cookin' - Cold Chicken Consomme, Okra, Crawfish & Mushrooms
programme.desc: Join Justin as he demonstrates how to prepare and cook Cold Chicken Consomme, Okra, Crawfish & Mushrooms!

programme.title: What's For Dinner? Salmon Filets
programme.desc: Ken and Mary Jo have a fun time in the kitchen cooking salmon filets, plus a few other excellent dishes.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - Disappearing Act
programme.desc: The collapse of our Bee population is a crisis that could affect a third of the plants we eat and depend on. Beekeeper Dave Hackenberg takes Chef David Guas inside the hives to find out what is happening to our pollinator populations. In a picturesque Pennsylvania orchard, the chef and beekeeper watch the bees buzz, discussing ways in which these important creatures might be saved.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Bean Chronicles
programme.desc: The variety of bean-based dishes in Korean cuisine is a testament to Korea’s ingenuity and resourcefulness. On The Bean Chronicles, Marja travels to Chodang to see artisinal tofu get made the old-fashioned way with fresh soybeans and ocean water and then enjoys a four course tofu meal with fresh tofu, each preparation completely distinct and delicious enough to convince any tofu nay-sayer.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: Anne Kearney, Bob Waggoner, and Frank Stitt
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Smoked Salmon Terrine, Seared Red Leg Partridge with Ravioli of Foie Gras, and Blackberry Cobbler. Restaurants include: Peristyle in New Orleans, Wild Boar Restaurant in Nashville, and Highlands Bar & Grill in Birmingham.

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Salmon
programme.desc: Chef Staib prepares Asian Steamed Salmon with Bok Choy and Salmon Tartare.

programme.title: Martin Yan - Quick and Easy - Stir Frys
programme.desc: With the help of his guest, Joanne Weir, Martin demonstrates the art of stir-frys with these light and healthy dishes.

programme.title: A Taste of History - George Washington’s Whiskey
programme.desc: Chef Walter Staib explores the grounds at Mt. Vernon and discovers how George Washington spent his retirement years. He’ll uncover Washington’s recipe for unaged rye whiskey produced and sold from the on-site distillery and will cook Pecan-Stuffed Suckling Pig, Pork Kidney and Plum Pudding.”

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal
programme.desc: Tawang is synonymous with Buddhism with its magnificent monastery set among the Himalayas. Paul's journey takes him to meet with monks, pay respects at a centuries-old stupa and cook with nuns.

programme.title: Into the Outback with Abbey Holmes
programme.desc: Arriving in Darwin, Abbey hits the ground running thirsty, and keen to find the coldest beer in the territory, goes on a pub crawl by helicopter. Feeling like a refreshing swim, she jumps into the Cage of Death, sharing the pool with a massive saltwater croc.

programme.title: Into the Outback with Abbey Holmes
programme.desc: In the rugged plains of the Top End, Abbey joins good friend Matt Wright. They fend off an extremely feisty female croc, Sweet Thing. Abbey also meets some of his best mates along the journey, who just so happen to be about 17 foot long.

programme.title: Into the Outback with Abbey Holmes
programme.desc: Abbey teams up with DEMED Rangers and Traditional Land Owners in West Arnhem to see everything the region has to offer.

programme.title: Into the Outback with Abbey Holmes
programme.desc: Abbey travels to one of her favourite regions in the Northern Territory, paying a visit to her good friend Larry Guruwiwi.

programme.title: Into the Outback with Abbey Holmes
programme.desc: Abbey faces her fears and cage dives with ferocious tiger sharks. Back on land, she visits the local market for a tasty mango smoothie treat.

programme.title: Lucky Chow
programme.desc: Lucky Chow discovers the culinary delights found in Asian houses of worship across America.

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal
programme.desc: Kolkata, the first stop of Pablo's journey and the gastronomical capital of India. Pablo explores the streets, local markets and meets a lot of exciting people who give him a taste of the regions cuisine.

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal
programme.desc: The Monpa Tribe are the corn farmers who reside in this small, beautiful village of Dirang. The mountain slopes and the corn harvest remind Pablo of his home and the comfort food warm his soul.

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal
programme.desc: Pablo steps foot in one of the most remote parts of the Arunachal Pradesh, the Lubrang Valley, which shelters the Brokpa Tribe and their yaks from the very unpredictable weather.

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce Africa
programme.desc: Upon arriving in Zanzibar, a picturesque island known for its vast white sand beaches and its cultural melting-pot of African and Arabic culture, David is enchanted by the local people and their laid-back way of life. He meets a young business owner who builds houseboats and is gaining success in the tourism industry. Together they have fun cooking fresh local seafood for friends right on the boat. Later, David tours the winding streets and colourful markets of Stone Town with a couple of musicians and learns about the struggles of being a creative Muslim woman in this patriarchal society.

programme.title: Kyle Supley's Out There - NY Classics!
programme.desc: Kyle visits with his friend and rising star, Bridget Everett and takes her to an East Village staple, the quirky Ray's Belgian French Fry shop that epitomizes old New York City.

programme.title: Kyle Supley's Out There - The Queer Interior!
programme.desc: Kyle's friend Douglas Calhoun, creator of the Queer Interior website, visits Kyle's apartment and collection.

programme.title: Kyle Supley's Out There - The Haarcut
programme.desc: Kyle visits his good friend, ragtime barber, Michael Haar's apartment in Queens to see his vintage phonograph and barber shop collection, and a get a new 'do.

programme.title: Kyle Supley's Out There - Drawn Me In!
programme.desc: Kyle visits his friend, blind-contour illustrator Ian Sklarsky, and both pay a visit to veteran illustrator Robert. W Richards.

programme.title: Kyle Supley's Out There - Flea Is Me
programme.desc: Kyle visits his favorite flea market, the Chelsea Flea Market, to see what New York characters are visiting on it's final weekend inside The Garage.

programme.title: Kyle Supley's Out There - Bear With Me!
programme.desc: We venture to Staten Island to make a meal with the "Bearmallow" creator and chef, R. Bear Karito.

programme.title: Kyle Supley's Out There - I Lava NY!
programme.desc: Fellow collector Bryin Dall shows Kyle around his amazing collection of mid-century lighting, lava lamps, and fantastic plastics.

programme.title: Kyle Supley's Out There - The Jazz Age Lawn Party!
programme.desc: Kyle meets up with his friends, the crew behind the very vintage Jazz Age Lawn Party held each year at New York's Governor's Island.

programme.title: Fabulocity - Willemstad, Curacao
programme.desc: Catch Jason Ruta and travel blogging superstar Kristen Sarah as they travel to the beautiful Dutch Caribbean island of Curaçao. This episode features snorkeling in the aqua blue waters surrounding the island, exploring the incredible landscape atop the fastest ATV's in the country, and wandering the quaint alleys and colorful houses of the Pietermaai District of the main city, Willemstad. Finally, join our hosts as they feast upon the locally inspired cuisine at Mundo Bizzaro, the crazy fusion restaurant that must be seen to be believed! Follow along as the team show you how Fabulous Willemstad Curacao really is!

programme.title: Fabulocity - Bangkok, Thailand
programme.desc: Join Adamo Ruggiero and SeeYouSoon.ca blogger Arienne Parzei as they experience Thailand's capital city: Bangkok. In this episode, the pair brush up on their boxing skills and challenge each other to a match in the country's national sport, Mauy Thai. They learn the taste profiles behind Thai cuisine at the world renowned Issaya Cooking Studio. Later, they visit the home of the Reclining Buddha, Wat Pho, and then find their own state of relaxation in the city's top spa at the Banyan Tree Hotel. Join us as Adamo and team discover the Fabulous world of Bangkok, Thailand.

programme.title: Fabulocity - Saskatoon, Saskatchewan
programme.desc: Join Jason Ruta and travel blogger Julia Eskins as they head to the heart of the Canadian prairies to find out what makes Saskatoon, Saskatchewan so fabulous. Here, they experience the city's historic past at the Western Development Museum. They bike the great Canadian landscape along the scenic Meewasin Trail. They taste the local cuisine in a one-of-a-kind tour of Saskatoon's farmers' market with one of Canada's top chefs, Nathan Guggenheimer of Ayden's Kitchen. Later, they get up close and personal with Wycleff Jean right before he takes the stage for the city's world-renowned Jazz Festival.

programme.title: Fabulocity - Charlottetown, PEI
programme.desc: The pristine Atlantic awaits as Adamo Ruggiero and travel & food blogger Natalie Taylor visit idyllic Prince Edward Island, home to Canada's favorite fictional character, Anne of Green Gables. Our hosts immediately get into the eastern Canadian culture with an oyster shucking contest and seafood feast. From there they jump into kayaks on the open ocean to scope out the source of the great seafood on the island. After digging for their own clams the team are off to the races - literally - as they take to the racetrack for the PEI 'Owner For a Day' experience .Here the pair pick a horse, groom it for race day and cheer it on to victory - or not - from the centre of Charlottetown's Red Shores race track. Finally, the pair take part in an island tradition with Celtic music and dancing at one of the many traditional Irish pubs on the island. Don't miss this episode as we show you just how fabulous Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island really is.

programme.title: Fabulocity - Dublin, Ireland
programme.desc: The luck of the Irish catches up with Adamo Ruggiero and travel blogger Arienne Parzei in the heart of the Celtic culture of Dublin, Ireland. The two pick up where they left off in Thailand with some good healthy competition on the Hurley pitch. What's Hurley, you ask? Tune in to find out! From there the pair don their walking shoes and traverse the city core on the city's own Fab Food Trail, getting to sample the finest food the city has to offer, one local shop at a time. Next the team does the one thing you must do in Dublin: get a pint of Guinness right from the source! Finally, our hosts travel across the rolling Irish countryside in hopes of finding out the secret of the great Irish Kissing Festival in Lisdoonvarna. Catch Fabulocity in the heart of the Gaelic world and see just how Fabulous Dublin, Ireland truly is.

programme.title: Fabulocity - Toronto, Canada
programme.desc: Host Adamo Ruggiero and guest Julia Eskins take to the skies in this Toronto bound episode of Fabulocity from the must see Distillery District to the bohemian paradise Kensington Market. The team don't miss a beat in Canada's largest and most visited city.

programme.title: Masters of the Pacific - Masters Of The Pacific Coast: Arrival
programme.desc: Archaeologist Dr Jago Cooper explores the American Northwest, revealing how a culture was established on the coast that has lasted for over 10,000 years - making it perhaps the longest continuous culture anywhere in the Americas.

programme.title: Masters of the Pacific - Masters Of The Pacific Coast: Survival
programme.desc: In the second of two episodes, archaeologist Dr Jago Cooper explores the American Northwest, revealing how a cultural tradition that began over 10,000 years ago managed to survive against the odds.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - It’s Only Rock ’n Roll
programme.desc: When the Rolling Stones make their historic first visit to Havana, only one Cuban photographer gets a press pass—revolutionary and rock fan, Ivan Soca Pascual.

programme.title: My Family and the Galapagos - Episode 1
programme.desc: As the Halls family settle into their new home, they quickly realize that the Galapagos islands are like nowhere else on Earth, a place where the remarkable wildlife views them as just another animal.

programme.desc: Josh Altman lists a home with a $2 million dollar closet, but is left hung out to dry when his client refuses every offer.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Seismic Retrofit, Dryer Vent
programme.desc: Kevin travels to Portland, Oregon to learn how to protect homes from earthquakes Mark stains concrete in Open House, Tom explains why and how to change the locks in a new home Richard travels to Cleveland to reroute a lengthy dryer vent.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Cabinet Upgrade, Secret Garden
programme.desc: Nathan upgrades a kitchen to have soft close cabinets the team shares some home inspection nightmares Richard and Kevin discuss how gas regulators work and how their malfunction caused gas explosions in Lawrence, MA Jenn cleans up an overgrown garden and redesigns it as a secret garden.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Closet Door, Bathroom Paint
programme.desc: Tom travels to Pittsburgh to replace a bi-fold closet door with one that is more appropriate for the house Jenn discusses alternatives to flower bouquets that make great gifts Mauro paints a bathroom using a mold resistant paint.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Vertical Garden, Toilet Factory
programme.desc: Jenn installs a vertical garden to maximize space for a homeowner Tom explains the uses for different drill bits Richard travels to a plumbing facility in New Jersey to learn about advances in toilet engineering that help save water.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Stucco Repair, Gas Dryer

programme.title: Ask TOH | Paint Metal Railing, Wine Rack

programme.title: Ask TOH | Prairie Grasses, Solar Flower
programme.desc: Jenn partners with an ecologist in Cheyenne, Wyoming to learn about different types of prairie grasses and how to care for them Kevin learns about ways to make a home more resistant against wildfires in Future House, Ross sees a robotic, ground mounted solar array that mimics a sunflower.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Smart Irrigation, Jimmy DiResta

programme.title: Mystery Millionaire: The Art of Deception

programme.title: Mystery Millionaire: The Lonely Surfer

programme.title: Mystery Millionaire: Fitness Mogul Strips Down

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Ten (Part Two) " - In the season finale, tempers flare as the two contestants prepare one last dinner service for Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 15 Chefs Compete" - Chef Gordon Ramsay returns for a fourth season of culinary torture. Fifteen chefs will compete for the chance to work at Ramsay's own restaurant in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 14 Chefs Compete" - The season's first challenge finds the contestants slicing halibut into thin six-ounce fillets. One member of each team must serve as maître d' during the dining service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 13 Chefs Compete" - After chickens wake them up in their living quarters, the contestants must pluck what once clucked, then cook them for the evening's family-style dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 12 Chefs Compete" - The two teams compete to make the most pasta for the evening's dinner service, and a kitchen accident puts one contestant in the hospital.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 11 Chefs Compete" - The first challenge for the remaining eleven chefs: make a gourmet pizza. The winners enjoy gourmet burgers in Santa Barbara while the losers prepare for the night's dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 10 Chefs Compete" - The ten remaining chefs must please a picky teen who has come to Hell's Kitchen for her birthday party. The team that designs the best menu wins a teen-themed treat.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 9 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay makes the nine remaining chefs take a blindfolded taste test. The winners get to go to a spa the losers must clean the dorm.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 8 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay asks for a volunteer to switch sides. The group dynamic changes as the teams face their next challenge: creating four dishes using twenty specific ingredients.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 7 Chefs Compete" - In the opening challenge, the two teams compete in a relay race. The winners earn surfing lessons while the losers must clean Hell's Kitchen from top to bottom.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mama Rita's
programme.desc: Ramsay finds that the Mexican eatery Mama Rita's suffers from a disorganized kitchen. Meanwhile, the owner may have to sacrifice a friendship in order to save her business.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Anna Vincenzo's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Anna Vincenzo's, a family-run eatery in Boca Raton, Florida. He learns that the stubborn owner doesn't welcome change. After his ideas are ignored, Ramsay walks out.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited #3
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay revisits some of the worst restaurants previously encountered: Handlebar and the Black Pearl (season two) and Casa Roma (season three) to see how they are doing. There's good news, bad news, and a surprise.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Fleming
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Fleming, a Danish eatery in Miami. The stubborn owner doesn't want to update the place and Ramsay discovers something in the cooler that leads him to close the restaurant.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Sushi Ko
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay finds a failing second location of a family-owned eatery. Debt, a breakdown of the family dynamic and a relative who has lost his passion for cooking all plague the restaurant.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited #2
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay revisits restaurants Giuseppi and Sante La Brea, from season two, to see if they have succeeded there is good news and there is bad news. Also included is an update on what happened at Finn McCool's.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Spanish Pavillion
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Spanish Pavillion in New Jersey. He discovers that a pair of bickering brothers are running the eatery to the ground with their undercooked food and outdated atmosphere.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Classic American
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay arrives at debt-ridden eatery owned by two former waitresses. Things are so bad that Ramsay holds an intervention to address leadership and communication problems.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: PJ's Steakhouse
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits PJ's Steakhouse, a restaurant that is dying due to management's lack of control and poor food quality.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited No. 4
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay returns to a few restaurants to see if they took his advice. The eateries he visits include Mojito, The Junction (formerly Flamango's) and Bazzini.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Roll Out The Red Carpet" - In their final challenge before Fashion Week, the designers travel to the glamour capital of the world, Los Angeles, to create red carpet looks. One designer takes a huge risk with everything at stake. Designer and Project Runway Junior judge Christian Siriano joins the judges.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 1" - The designers are heading home to work on their collections and prepare for a home visit from Tim. Once back in NYC, they are met with another twist.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 2" - After a brutal critique with the judges, the finalists rush to retool their collections for New York Fashion Week. Superstar Carrie Underwood deliberates with the judges on who will be crowned the winner of Project Runway Season 14.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Reunion Special" - The Season 14 designers and Tim come together to take care of unfinished business and settle some scores. And on this reunion, even Tim Gunn has an issue that he wants settled!

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Road to the Runway" - In this season's casting special, "Road to the Runway," sixteen new designers will be introduced with a behind-the-scenes look from their casting auditions home visits, casting submissions, and sit down interviews. Tim Gunn will present the designers in carefully carved out categories that will lead you into the season premiere.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "An Unconventional Launch Party" - Kicking off the season with an Unconventional Materials Challenge, Heidi and Tim welcome the designers at a Season 15 launch party. The designers are shocked to learn that the decor for the party will also serve as their materials for their looks. Savannah Guthrie joins the judging panel.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Just Fabulous!" - The designers must create an outfit to flatter all body types, and the challenge proves to be more difficult for some than others. Guest judge Nina Dobrev joins.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Blacklight or Daylight?" - The designers have to create a look that sparkles not only in daylight, but also under blacklights on the Runway. Anxieties rise when the unusual materials leave many of the designers in the dark. Jamie King joins the judges this week.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Sink or Swim" - In the Heidi Klum Swimwear Challenge, the designers create their own fabric to use in crafting a stylish swimsuit. The winner will have their design sold as part of Heidi's swimwear line! But the contestants lack of swimsuit experience makes for a harder challenge than expected.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "There's No "I" in "Team"" - In the season's first Team Challenge, the designers exercise their business savvy when they pitch their collection ideas to raise money from a group of mystery investors. The stakes are raised when they learn that the winning team members will each receive $5,000, and the winner will be featured in Marie Claire magazine!

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "There IS Crying in Fashion" - The designers are excited to attend a press event, but their festive mood is quickly spoiled when the party turns out to be a challenge. The misdirect proves to be more than most of the designers can handle, as many of them have to start their looks over completely when criticized by a disappointed Tim Gunn. Emily Ratajkowski joins the judging panel.

programme.title: El Show de Willi
programme.desc: Willi estrena su propio reality show. Todo el mundo está en vilo y pronto se revelará su verdadera intención.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar es un drama épico ambientado en el siglo XVI que relata la historia sobre un matrimonio político de conveniencia entre un emperador mogol, Akbar y una princesa Rajput, Jodha Bai. La trama se centra en cómo éste matrimonio político trae el amor entre ellos en una medida que cambió el destino de la India, así mismo retrata las guerras de ese tiempo junto con las relaciones entre los mogoles y los Rajputs. Gran parte de la historia recrea el funcionamiento de las instituciones icónicas de la época como las reinas, los tribunales, las cortesanas, los ministros y su influencia en la historia de amor de Akbar y Jodha Bai. La serie también destaca cómo el Emperador Mogol Jalaluddin adquiere el título de Akbar del pueblo.

programme.title: Detrás De Las Cámaras
programme.desc: Programa de investigación narrado por personajes que han marcado el mundo del entretenimiento venezolano. Acompáñenos a revivir las experiencias y anécdotas más memorables.

programme.title: Bárbara
programme.desc: Una comedia de amor donde los enamorados tendrán que luchar con diferentes contratiempos.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Cada año cientos de mujeres caen en las redes de reclutadores que trafican con personas, viéndose forzadas a una vida de esclavitud sexual y laboral. Esta es la historia de Ana, Frida y Seleni, tres bellas jóvenes, engañadas bajo la promesa de alcanzar la vida soñada. Inocentes y vulnerables, con la férrea convicción de que pese a las condiciones adversas en las que viven, pueden alcanzar un mejor futuro, serán engañadas y utilizadas por personas inescrupulosas que las adentrarán en una red de prostitución de la que no podrán escapar.

programme.title: Estrella Fugaz
programme.desc: Ex estrella del pop, se enamora de la hija del dueño del hotel donde va a cantar, la cual esta comprometida.

programme.title: Pecado De Amor
programme.desc: Una Monja, Que Se Encuentra En Una Prisión De Mujeres, Confiesa A Una Reclusa Sobre Su Turbulento Pasado Como Cantante De Cabaret, Madre Soltera Y Asesina Convicta.

programme.title: Subi Que Te Llevo
programme.desc: Un famoso cantante musical se enamora de una chica que vive con su anticuado tio. Para disimular y poder ser aceptado en la familia, el cantante se disfraza y se hace pasar por su hermano gemelo recién llegado al país.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Lamuweri Guluka - The First Option
programme.desc: Lamuweri Guluka is an African name meaning “hard to pronounce on the first try.” Lam is a seasoned comedian who has performed at colleges, comedy clubs, and cafes all over the country whose background as a nerdy, suburban, black male gives him a unique comedic perspective that audiences love.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Costaki Economopoulos - Now That I'm A Grown-up
programme.desc: For 20 years Costaki has been living his dream as a full-time stand up comic. He has written jokes for Bette Midler, Jay Leno, MTV, and BET. You may have seen him on Showtime or heard him on Sirius, but you probably know him best from his regular appearances on the nationally syndicated Bob & Tom Radio Show.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Andy Forrester - Most of this is Baby Fat
programme.desc: Andy Forrester's brand of off-the-wall humor has made him a fan favorite at clubs all over the country for almost 20 years.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jeremy Nunes - Neighborhood Sasq-Watch
programme.desc: Jeremy Nunes has drawn rave reviews from critics for his clever observations, unique storytelling style, and ability to improvise with his audience.

programme.title: Marc Yaffee - Mid-Laugh Crisis
programme.desc: Adopted at birth and confused ever since, Marc takes his audiences on a comedy joyride as he explores his multi-ethnic roots and the culture clashes that fill his world. Marc’s smart but relatable comedy demonstrates a universal appeal that has landed him appearances on PBS, Comics Unleashed, The Latino Laugh Festival and the Showtime special, Goin’ Native. Funny not filthy, Marc serves audiences his original comedy recipe, specially prepared for non- stop laughs. Tasty topics, spicy premises and savory punchlines, are all dished out with a dash of sarcasm and a grain of salt. A regular in Las Vegas, Marc has performed six times overseas for Armed Forces Entertainment and he’s a past winner of Ventura Comedy Festival’s Funniest Person Contest.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Greg Morton - I Started Out, as a Baby
programme.desc: Greg Morton had only two choices in schoolyard conflicts. Learn the ways of the force, or use his wit to diffuse situations. That wit would soon lead to winning first prize in the, ‘So You Think You’re Funny Contest’ and the beginning of his stand-up comedy career. He was no longer the shy introverted kid, drawing cartoons in the corner. He had finally found his voice. A voice he would later use to direct and voice over twenty Saturday Morning cartoons. This former mobile disc jockey, who used to play songs at weddings, now sings song parodies on nationally syndicated radio shows, like the Bob and Tom Show. Take his Obama Man, sung to the tune of Candy Man, which has racked up over 4 million hits on YouTube.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Lucas Bohn - 2 Cool 4 School
programme.desc: LUCAS BOHN is energetic with an edge. The perfect blend of schoolboy charm and bad-boy charisma, his comedy is both smart and audacious. Known as the little guy who generates big laughs, Lucas has shared the stage with Dave Chappelle, Jimmy Fallon, and Kevin Hart. Lucas’ high-energy shows and hilarious impersonations make him an instant hit with audiences of all ages. In 2013 Lucas was nominated "Comedian of the Year" by Campus Activities Magazine.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Andrew Hobbs - A Joke Unless it Works
programme.desc: Have you ever, as an adult, been bullied by a healthcare professional or popular middle school girl? Andrew has. The comedy of Andrew Hobbs encapsulates the bizarre awkwardness of belated maturity and his attempts to appear in control. Andrew will have you rolling with laughter as he twists a narrative of humor and heart from his own life experiences and observations. His comedy has been featured in comedy festivals across the country. He has been perfecting his craft since childhood and throughout adulthood.

programme.title: Dwight Slade - Animal Cracker
programme.desc: Part man, part ageless boy comedian Dwight Slade has the privilege of being a comedy legend in American stand up. The winner of this year's Boston Comedy Festival, Slade combines an intelligent, raging voice of justice with the snickering attitude of a high school prankster. He gives the impression of a man on a journey. Who enjoys nothing more than making fun of everything along the way. Born in Seattle, Dwight moved often in his early years, living in San Mateo, California Wilton, Connecticut Marietta, Georgia and Houston, Texas.

programme.title: Josh Fonokalafi - The Specific Islander
programme.desc: Joshua T Fonokalafi is a Utah based comedian from the mean streets of Ogden, Utahs own Compton. Raised in the Northwest and the son of an Islander immigrant, Joshua tells of his hardships growing up as one of the biggest minorities in the country. Joshua was most recently featured at the Idaho Laugh Fest and is preparing to film his very own comedy special with VidAngel. He's acted in Jackie and Ryan with Katherine Heigl, and in Certain Woman with Laura Dern and Kristen Stewart. Joshua's quick wit and humor will give you an amazing abdominal workout.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jeff Capri - Capricious
programme.desc: Jeff Capri uses his cynical perspective to riff on oxygen bars, playing darts to get in shape, and men taking their shirts off before fights.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: BT - My Life As I Know It Now
programme.desc: With an act that crosses all boundaries, B.T. will surely have you rolling with laughter. His physical performance style and charm landed him two performances on NBC's Friday Night Videos and a performance at the prestigious HBO U.S. Comedy Arts Festival. B.T. has also appeared on BET’s Comic View, MTV's The Jenny McCarthy Show, and FOX's The Keenan Ivory Wayans Show.

programme.title: Chelle T: It Just Got Real
programme.desc: Laughing is great medication and now the doctor is in. Chelle T has brought with her a whirlwind of imagination, stage presence, and originality.

programme.title: Maija DiGiorgio: Maija Pinion
programme.desc: In her comedy, Maija examines the complexities of what it means to be a mixed-race, multicultural woman.

programme.title: Kermet Apio: There's No I in Self Esteem
programme.desc: Kermet Apio enjoyed a childhood in Honolulu, Hawaii, where he spent his time watching television, playing, and procrastinating everything else.

programme.title: Glen Tickle: The Favorite
programme.desc: Glen Tickle explains the things only professional comedians have time for and tells all the stories he’s only allowed to tell on stage.

programme.title: Steve Hofstetter: A Trip to Japan
programme.desc: Steve Hoffstetter covers everything from paper decapitations in plane crashes to seeing-eye children.

programme.title: Patrick Keane: Long Love the Keane
programme.desc: Originally from the Midwest, raised in Orange County, college in Montana & a 3 year stint in Asia make Patrick Keane a comedian with a background.

programme.title: Reno Collier: Monkeys and Stuff
programme.desc: Reno's journey began at the Punchline Comedy Club in Atlanta, GA where he tended bar to supplement his day job.

programme.title: Kevin Jordan: Cause I Said So!
programme.desc: A Former Los Angeles Police Officer, Kevin has thrilled audiences at Clubs, on Cruise ships, and for the troops worldwide.

programme.title: Jay Whittaker: Safe for Work
programme.desc: Jay Whittaker is a comedian, actor, host and writer hailing from Los Angeles & Salt Lake City.

programme.title: Helene Angley: Queen Size
programme.desc: Helene brings honesty to the stage that helps everyone relax.

programme.title: Rodney Norman: Santa
programme.desc: All the way from the North Pole, it's Santa Claus!

programme.title: Kortney Shane Williams: Unsubstantiated
programme.desc: Kortney has been part of The Bridgetown Comedy Festival, Boston Comedy Festival, Laughing Skull Comedy Festival, and Bumbershoot Arts festival.

programme.title: John Moyer: Welcome to My World
programme.desc: By combining 20 years of stand up comedy experience, with a natural quick-wit and improvisational showmanship, Moyer connects with every audience.

programme.title: Karen Morgan: Go Dawgs!
programme.desc: Karen Morgan moved from the courtroom to comedy after being selected as a Finalist on Nickelodeon TV’s Search for the Funniest Mom in America.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Omega Cop
programme.desc: Spanning exotic, post-apocalyptic locations such as The City Dump and The Bleachers at the Local High School After Field Hockey Practice Lets Out, Omega Cop is truly a feast for the senses! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Library World
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to the short Library World! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill as they step into Library World!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Karate Cop
programme.desc: John Travis (Ron Marchini) is back! Who? You know, the guy from Omega Cop? Played a cop, possibly the Omega Cop? Well he’s back! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Why Vandalism?
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this short that asks the question Why Vandalism? Mike, Kevin and Bill are on hand to riff this classic short from the wrong side of the tracks.

programme.title: RiffTrax: Rollergator
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to Rollergator! Shot on video without any fancy pants “microphones” or “lights” or “permits to record here”, Rollergator is truly something to behold. Please join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for Rollergator.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Alone At Home
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to the short Alone at Home! Mike, Kevin, and Bill have not been Alone at Home for years, because their wives know they’d just eat sticks of butter and wind up sticking their fingers in the electrical outlets again.

programme.title: RiffTrax: The Magic Sword
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this cheesy 60's fantasy classic! Spells will be cast! Heroes will be born! Bones will be seized! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill for The Magic Sword!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - The Calendar: How to Use It
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this short featuring two spandex clad adults who intrude a young girl's bedroom to teach her all about the calendar. Mark your calendars and join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for The Calendar: How to Use It!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Deadly Prey
programme.desc: Deadly Prey is the kind of budget badassery you’ve come to expect from the guy who donned a mesh belly shirt to play David Carradine’s son in Future Zone. Align your desk grenades properly, then join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for 80s action cheese at its ripest.

programme.title: Dolphin Cruise -Episode 3
programme.desc: Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a science contest at school and win a trip on a luxury yacht but not everything goes as planned when they set out to sea. When Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a school science contest and win a Dolphin sight-seeing trip, not everything goes to plan...As the girls set out to sea on a luxury yacht, misunderstandings and disagreements occur which become secondary when they discover a pod of dolphins in danger. The girls learn that they have to compromise and trust in each other if they are to save the dolphins and their trip out to sea...

programme.title: Never Trust A Snake
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor - the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe. Pythor lures Lloyd under his spell and steals a map from him that will show him where the remaining two snakes tribes dwell and Uncle Sensei saves Lloyd from doom.

programme.title: The Knights Code - Episode 104
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert - Macy's parents - from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: Country Girls - Episode 4
programme.desc: When the girls go to Mia's grandparents' ranch and Olivia accidentally knocks down the neighbor's barn, the girls promise to raise money to rebuild it and now have to learn to set aside their differences and work together to make good on their promise. Mia invites her friends to her grandparents' ranch for the weekend. But when Olivia accidentally knocks down a neighbor's barn with a tractor, the girls promise to raise the money to rebuild it themselves. Complicating matters, Mia and Stephanie turn out to like the same boy, Martin. They'll have to learn to set aside their differences and work together if they're going to raise enough money to make good on their promise.

programme.title: The Snake King
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer - an ancient beast who can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: Fright Knight - Episode 105
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds "The Book of Fear." It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her "knighmarish" power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest - as they fight off the Whipperella - that they we find out Aaron's true fear - the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Emma's Dilemma - Episode 5
programme.desc: When Stephanie becomes obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in a float building contest and accidentally disregards Emma's ideas and design, Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to get revenge on Stephanie. When the girls enter a float-building contest, Emma is especially excited to share her design idea for the float. But no one is listening to her, especially Stephanie, who's become obsessed with beating her rival Tanya in the contest. Emma finally does find someone who appreciates her design... Tanya! Tanya convinces Emma to join her team to build the float design. But is Tanya just using Emma to get revenge on Stephanie?

programme.title: Tick Tock
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: The Golden Castle - Episode 106
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie "Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle" he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: "The Golden Castle." While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for "The Golden Castle" and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a "script." The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight...Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: Friends Of The Jungle - Episode 6
programme.desc: When Olivia's Aunt Sophie is getting married and the groom has gone missing in the jungle, the girls fly out to the jungle in secret to try to find him in time for the wedding. The girls are super excited to be planning a wedding for Olivia's Aunt Sophie. There's just one little problem: Olivia learns that the groom has gone missing in the jungle while working at an animal rescue station! Not wanting to worry her aunt, Olivia, Stephanie and Mia secretly fly to the jungle to try and find the groom, Henry, rescuing a few animals along the way. Too bad Emma and Andrea couldn't keep the secret back in Heartlake City. Now, Sophie, Emma and Andrea join the others in the jungle to try and find Henry before the rapidly approaching wedding date!

programme.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement - Episode 107
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something...one of the Magic Books! It's "The Book of Deception." They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: Andrea's Big Moment - Episode 7
programme.desc: When famous pop star Livi comes to Heartlake City to judge a talent show, our five friends Olivia, Mia, Andrea, Emma and Stephanie all decide to enter - and one of them, in particular, really wants to win but faces some serious challenge from an old rival. A talent show has come to Heartlake City and all the girls enter the talent competition hoping to impress the judges, especially their idol, pop star Chloe. No one wants a shot at stardom more than Andrea, which is why the other girls are surprised when she doesn't show up to practice before the first round of the competition. Very nearly eliminated prior to the big show, Andrea panics and throws herself into an intense practice-training mode, even shutting her friends out when they're trying to help her with her performance. Just moments before her live TV debut, Andrea realizes she's missing a key element to her act. Can she pull it off without her friends? And are the other girls willing to help after being pushed away?

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win "The Blade Cup" where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: The Black Knight - Episode 108
programme.desc: It seems the NEXO-Knights are attacking villages throughout the realm! But why? A mysterious Black Knight appears to defend the cities from the rogue NEXO-villains! Jestro, happy he has the REAL Book of Deception, uses it to create bad versions of the NEXO-Knights. The "fake" knights then attack villages and hamlets. When the real NEXO-Knights arrive, they're booed and pelted with food. Why does everyone hate them? To make matters more confusing, a giant Mech Suit in black - The BLACK KNIGHT - appears to defend the kingdom's villages from the fake knights. The Black Knight ends up being very powerful and throws Jestro and his fake knights for a loop. He's cool and mysterious. But when the fake Knights get the better of him, the REAL NEXO-Knights appear to fend them off and learn their deceptive secret. The Knights save the Black Knight and they open him up to find...young ROBIN! (He used a deep, deceptive voice.) The Knights realize that Robin has potential. But maybe he still has some learning to do.

programme.title: Kate's Island - Episode 8
programme.desc: The five friends leave for science camp that takes place on an island and during the trip, they meet the stand-offish Kate - but they soon realize that there's more to her than meets the eyes and that you shouldn't judge the book by its cover. No one is more excited than Olivia about science camp at a beautiful rocky offshore island with a lighthouse. But Olivia quickly gets off on the wrong foot with a mysterious girl named Kate who seems obsessed with a medallion necklace and the island's rumored history of pirates and treasure. Even worse for Olivia, Kate seems to be growing extra chummy with Mia, even sneaking around the island with her late at night. With the help of Stephanie, Emma and Andrea, Olivia is determined to get to the bottom of the girls' secret friendship and find out once and for all what they're searching for on the island, but they better not let Mrs. Stevens catch them out of their cabin past curfew.

programme.title: The Green Ninja
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes inside the unstable Fire Temple that is built on a volcano.

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness - Episode 109
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap...is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: "The Book of Destruction." With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous, but Aaron says he must take the risk to gather the Knights and save Knighton.

programme.title: The Grand Hotel - Episode 9
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression - but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon - but can they trust him?

programme.title: The Might And The Magic - Episode 110
programme.desc: Aaron races across the kingdom to gather the NEXO-Knights as Jestro and his Destructive Monsters attack the King's Castle. The Knights must get back to the capitol in time, or Jestro will rule the kingdom! Jestro, while still attacking the King's Castle, has second thoughts until the Book of Monsters orders the mad jester to feed him another magic book he's found (and has been saving.) It's the powerful "Book of Revenge!" Now, combining the powers of Revenge and Destruction, Jestro and his monsters will get their vengeance on King Halbert and the Kingdom of Knighton. Jestro and his monsters lay siege...will they destroy the castle?! Meanwhile, Aaron races across the Kingdom gathering the NEXO-Knights one at a time. As each Knight rejoins the group, they become a more and more powerful team. They even get Robin to join them as the Black Knight in his repaired power suit. Our Knights arrive, finally regrouped, fight off Jestro, save the castle and the King. It's a glorious victory! The King is so pleased after seeing how the brave NEXO-Knights saved his kingdom, he allows Macy to join them as an official NEXO-Knight.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer leads us to the heart of South America to explore the Amazon River Islands. Life on these islands benefit from the Amazon and Orinoco Rivers, as well as the rich rainforest that dominates the North East region of South America. From high flying squirrel monkeys to slow moving sloths, we will explore what makes the Amazon River Islands such a fascinating region of the Earth.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us to the peak of South America to the Andes Mountains. The tumultuous weather and treacherous heights have caused many unusual animals to form specialized behaviors in order to survive. We’ll explore what life is like for the descendants of the Incans, as well as the animals who call the Andes Mountains home.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us back to the Philippines where we will find some of the most fascinating wildlife in the animal kingdom. We’ll head to the mangrove forests where people still call home and use the rivers and streams as a means of transportation, food, and fun. We will also head to the trees where macaques play, and where tree nymphs turn into beautiful butterflies.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we head back to South America to explore some of our favorite animals. We’ll start in Venezuela where the Orinoco River provides a home for people and animals – such as pumas, egrets, and crocodiles. We’ll also head to the Amazon Rain Forest where life is bursting at every turn. From red howler monkeys to harpy eagles, the Amazon Rain Forest provides us with some of the most fascinating animals on Earth.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we venture back to some of our favorite islands from around the world. We start in South America, home to the Amazon River Islands that are full of wildlife. From red howlers to squirrel monkeys, the trees on these islands are full of furry creatures. We’ll then head to South East Asia where the Philippines are full of unbelievable insects. We’ll even get a firsthand look at a tree nymph becoming a butterfly, but its new life gets off to a sticky start.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, we head to Asia and visit the highest peaks in the world, the Himalayas. We’ll see everything from the migration of cranes to the daily life of snow leopards. The climate and landscape of these mountains are anything but convenient, so we’ll explore what it takes to call the Himalayas home.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: On today’s episode of Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us back to the Patagonia region of South America. This diverse landscape is full of animals that find ways to thrive in the coldest, steepest, and most dangerous places on Earth. From sea lions to armadillos, we’ll explore all the amazing animals that call Patagonia home.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us to Northern India, where we will explore the “Lost World’s” that remain. Here, we will discover what lives in the least human inhabited regions. From elephants to spectacle monkeys to pythons, you never know what you will find in this fascinating area of the world.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us on a journey to Vancouver Island. We’ll go on one of the most epic journeys in the animal kingdom with the pacific salmon that live in the streams and rivers. We’ll witness hungry black bears, slick sea lions, and other obstacles that the pacific salmon face on their way.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us back to explore the wildlife that lives in the country of Malaysia. Its diverse landscape is home to an incredible amount of different species. From shifty cave swiftlets to feisty fiddler crabs, we will explore what makes this ecosystem so special.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us back to the tropical archipelago that is Zanzibar. Its beautiful beaches are home to some of the biggest, and even some the smallest, species in the world. From monkeys swinging through the forest, to Aldabra tortoises ruling the beaches, we’ll discover the animals that make Zanzibar such an incredible ecosystem.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer takes us back to some of the most unbelievable, and unbelievably cold, places in the world. From the ice fields of Patagonia, to the high snowy mountains of the Himalayas, we’ll explore what thrives and survives in one of the most frigid ecosystems in the world.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dryer takes us back to some of the most extreme islands on Earth. We’ll explore the Amazon River Islands in South America, then discover what’s hiding in the trees in the Philippines. From squirrel monkeys leaping around in the Amazon, to fireflies illuminating the night sky, we’ll get up close and personal with the Earth’s most interesting animals.

programme.title: Earth Odyssey with Dylan Dreyer
programme.desc: Today on Earth Odyssey, host Dylan Dreyer will take us back to the incredible country that is Thailand. Giants roam the forests and swim through the reefs of this diverse and vast ecosystem. We’ll fish with the locals and be on the lookout for Asian elephants, because you never know what you’ll find when you explore Thailand’s incredible ecosystem.

programme.title: Dangerous Flights | Turn and Burn
programme.desc: Cory Bengtzen walked away from a lucrative car dealership to embark on a risky new career path: a used airplane delivery business. So far, it's beginning to look like a crash and burn endeavor. On the company's inaugural missions, two trans-global "ferry flights" over unforgiving waters, he and his team of daring cowboy pilots encounter wild weather, dangerous airstrips, and a series of mechanical failures. Enter the cockpit and see if this new business will finally take off, or if Cory's on a disaster collision course.

programme.title: Dangerous Flights | Fuel Critical
programme.desc: Dense jungles, steep learning curves, and big personalities cause turbulence and tension during two pressure-filled aircraft deliveries. Jump into the cockpit with owner Cory Bengtzen and co-pilot Kerry McCauley as they try to find their feet as a team while flying over the Amazon rainforest. Then follow pilot Randy McGehee on a U.N. relief mission to war-ravaged South Sudan, aboard a 1998 Dornier. It's a plane Randy's never flown, and he has just 48 hours to master it before embarking on the 6,000-mile journey.

programme.title: Dangerous Flights | Dark Skies
programme.desc: Cory's business is taking off. The demand for small plane deliveries is mounting, and so is the pressure for his team of cowboy pilots. Take an 11,000-mile island-hopping journey from Australia to the U.S. aboard the Phenom 100, a high-tech executive jet. It's the first time Kerry has flown one, and he needs to learn quickly. This mission will take him to the edge of North Korean airspace and into a blinding storm in Russia. Meanwhile, in Grenada, Cory and Randy have visibility issues of their own, battling through black skies to find a safe place to land.
